= Configuration =
== remove-empty-blocks ==
Empty @media, @font-face and @page blocks will get removed.

Defaults to: `true`

= remove-empty-rulesets =
Empty rulesets will get removed.

Defaults to: `true`

= remove-last-ruleset-semicolon =
The last semicolon of a ruleset will get removed.

Defaults to: `true`

= convert-css3-properties =
CSS3 properties will get translated to their browser specific counterparts.
`div {border-radius: 1em;}`
will get converted to:
`div {-moz-border-radius: 1em; -webkit-border-radius: 1em; -khtml-border-radius: 1em; border-radius: 1em;}`

Supported are: border-radius, border-top-left-radius, border-top-right-radius, border-bottom-right-radius, border-bottom-left-radius, box-shadow, opacity and text-shadow.

Defaults to: `true`

= convert-color-values =
Convert RGB color values to hex: `rgb(200,60%,5)` will get converted to `#c89905`

Defaults to: `false`

= compress-color-values =
If set to `true` hex colors will get compressed: `#aabbcc` will get compressed to `#abc`.

Defaults to: `false`

= compress-unit-values =
If set to `true` unit values will get compressed. For example `0px` will get compressed to `0`, `0.5px` to `.5px` and `0 0 0 0` to `0`.

Defaults to: `false`

= emulate-css3-variables =
See: [http://disruptive-innovations.com/zoo/cssvariables/ CSS Variables]

Defaults to: `true`
